name: The Impossible Prism - Fun Free Geometry Game
name_original: The Impossible Prism - Fun Free Geometry Game
description:
The premise of The Impossible Prism is easy: You are a Prism gliding through a endless world of black obstacles. Jump by tapping on the screen, see how the lights, shadows and colours changes in this incredible beautiful game.

With just one control, tapping the screen to jump, guide your prism onto blocks, over rotating squares and other geometry shapes to get to the next level.

- Hundreds of scenes and challenges
- Insane real time physics
- Battle through 6 different rooms
- Puzzles, action, and much more

Prepare for an almost impossible game in the world of lights, shadows and geometric shapes. Push your skills to the limit as you jump, fly and flip your way through dangerous passages and the deadly black geometric shapes. Can you master the Prism and and avoid it from breaking to a thousand pieces.
